Name: Wingsuit Flying
Description: Glide through the air in a specialized suit.

Name: Wakeboarding
Description: Riding a board while being towed behind a motorboat

Name: Snowboarding
Description: Descending a snow-covered slope while standing on a single board

Name: Skydiving
Description: Jumping from an aircraft with a parachute

Name: Paragliding
Description: Gliding through the air using a parachute-like canopy

Name: MTB
Description: Riding bicycles off-road, tackling trails and rough terrain

Name: Drifting
Description: driving technique where the driver intentionally oversteers

Name: Climbing
Description: Ascending rock faces or indoor climbing walls.

Name: Canoeing
Description: Propelling a canoe through water using paddles

Name: High Diving
Description: Diving from significant heights into water

Name: Ice Climbing
Description: Climbing ice formations such as frozen waterfalls or ice-covered rock
